params.text: Burin ƙwaɗo na taɓo tauraruwa
Akwai Wani Kwaɗo mai sha'awar kallan taurari. Yana son ya yi tsalle ya taɓo su. Wata rana dai ya ci alwashin sai ya taɓo tauraruwa!
Sai ya hau wani babban dutse don cin ma wannan burin nasa. Sai dai kash!, Taurarin sunyi masa nisa.
Jim kaɗam, sai ya ga wani ɗan tsauni. Sai ya hau wannan tsaunin, ya miƙa hannayensa, duk da haka dai taurarin nan sun masa nisa.
Ana nan, sai kwadon nan ya hango bishiyar kwakwa a gefensa. Bishiya mai tsayin gaske. Toh, nan fa yayi tunanin haƙarsa ta kusan cinma ruwa.
Sai ya fara dubarbarun hawa wannna bishiya. Da kyar dai ya samu ya hau bishiyar
Nan fa ya ƙara miƙe hannayensa... sai dai kash! Har wa yau, waɗannan taurari sun gagareshi taɓowa.
Kwaɗon nan ya ji takaici. Yayi shiru. Sannan zuciyarsa ta cika da damuwa.
Sai ya daura hannu akan ƙirjinsa kuma ya ce, " bazan karaya ba. Tabbas zai iya! ".
Nan take sai ya hango wani dan kududdufi. Taurari na shawagi a cikin ruwa.
Ya kalli taurarin yana cike da farin-ciki. Kawai sai ya auka cikin kududdufin.
Duk sanda ya matso kusa da wannan kududdufi, kusanci ya ke karawa a nashi tunanin zuwa ga waɗannan taurari.
Pap! Sai ya taɓa saman ruwan.
Nan dai ya sake fitowa ya zauna a waje.
Yana kallon taurari suna shawagi a cikin ruwa.

“Burin ƙwaɗo na taɓo tauraruwa” credits

This work, “Burin ƙwaɗo na taɓo tauraruwa” is a derivative of Frog's Starry Wish is translated by Alisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Based on Original story: by Sheesh Pal. © Room to Read , 2016. Some rights reserved.

“Burin ƙwaɗo na taɓo tauraruwa” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

 

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
